description:
If you're a huge Dallas fan, this is the app for you!  Dallas Football Fans provides you with access to the latest news, videos, stats, schedule, standings and scores. You'll always know what's happening with the team! 

You can also discuss the latest news and highlights with other Dallas fans using the built in chat feature. Make sure your voice is heard! 

There is no better or more comprehensive tool to stay up to date with Dallas. If you are a true fan, you owe it to yourself to download Dallas Football Fans today! 


** Brighthouse Labs and the Dallas Football Fans application are in no way associated with the NFL or the Dallas Cowboys. All trademarks are owned by their respective owners.
